EmailTemplate.subject: Early Withdrawal Notice 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
In case you are planning to withdraw your child(ren) at the end of the Autumn term (21st December, 2012), please be informed of the deadline for submission of the withdrawal notice, in order to receive reimbursement of the Development Contribution fee or an Early notice payback.
Please click here to download the withdrawal form that needs to be submitted either by email (signed and scanned) or by post/personal delivery by no later than 19th October, 2012. Any form received after this date will unfortunately be outside of the reimbursement time frame.
In order for the submission to be completed, you must receive a receipt of the form from either myself, the Headmaster or from the Head of Administration, Anastasia Ramazanova.
(Please be aware that on previous occasions forms have gone missing and then later found in school bags!)
Please contact me should you have any questions in this regard.
Best Regards,
Dino Vikas
Head of Admissions
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
